thread.section_title: KILL CLIFF Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of KILL CLIFF | killcliff.com
thread.title: Colleen Bogonovich
thread.title_full: KILL CLIFF reviewed by Colleen Bogonovich

author: Colleen Bogonovich
title: Colleen Bogonovich
text: The only downside with my order was that there was a bad snow storm in my area and the shipment was delayed by 3 days. This is as obviously no fault of the company itself, just an inconvenience. I love KillCliff, it's like liquid crack and I couldn't live without them.
